name: auth-system-monorepo
description: Complete authentication system with Rust gRPC backend, TypeScript proxy, and React Native mobile app

scripts.install:all: cd proxy && npm install && cd ../simple-proto && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:proxy
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:proxy && npm run clean:mobile

author: Your Name
